title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4700.11 - Public notice
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4700.11 - Public notice

State Regulations

In the main and New York City offices of the authority, a
notice shall be posted stating: (a) the
time and location where records shall be made available for inspection and
copying; (b) the name, title, business address and business telephone number of the records access officer
and fiscal officer of the authority; and
(c) the right to appeal by an applicant
denied access to a record for whatever reason and the name and business address
of the authority's executive director, the person to whom an appeal is to be
directed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4700.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
